custom_css: .iframe-container {display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; /* Remove if you don't want vertical centering */ padding: 20px; /* Add some space around the iframe on larger screens */}
.iframe-container iframe {max-width: 640px; width: 100%; /* This will make the iframe responsive */ height: 1700px; /* Fixed height for the iframe */ border: 0;}
@media (max-width: 640px) {.iframe-container {padding: 0px; /* Less padding on smaller screens to make the iframe wider */ } .iframe-container iframe {height: auto; min-height: 1700px; }}
